Nuts¶

class Modules.03_Nuts.main.Nuts(layout)¶
static classifier(data, num_level)¶

Categorizes each element in data into one of the num_level classes. The class separation is linear.

Parameters:
  • data – the list of elements that will be classified.
  • num_level – number of classes.
Returns:

The list of associated classes.
static explode(input_data)¶

Extracts geometry from the geojson passed by input_data. The types of geometry that are extracted are Polygon and MultiPolygon.

Parameters:input_data – Path to the geojson
Returns:Dataframe with the geometry.
static get_eurostats_geojson_list()¶

Generates dictionary of the eurostats geojson files and their NUTS level example: {'aei_pr_soiler': [1, 2, 3], 'trng_lfse_04': [1, 2]}

Returns:Dictionary of eurostats ID’s and NUTS level that where found in data/geojson/eurostats/nuts_*
static get_poly_coordinates(line, geom, coord_type)¶

Returns the coordinates (‘x’ or ‘y’) of edges of a Polygon exterior.

Parameters:
  • line – The current line to extract coordinates from.
  • geom – The geometry key in the line.
  • coord_type – either ‘x’ or ‘y’.
Returns:

x or y values of the polygon edges.
get_real_name(k)¶

…

Parameters:k (str) – represents the filename of eurostats
Returns:option tuple (value, label)
get_selected_year_index(observation)¶

Return the index for the selected year. will also set the list _years

Parameters:obersavation – The observation preselection observation[name]
Returns:false or id
match_file_to_name(name)¶

getting the real name from xml

Parameters:xml (str) – filename
Returns:xml title text
on_lvl_select(attr, old, new)¶

Callback for self.lvl_select. The method re-searches the available geojson’s and sets the options of self.id_select to the newly selected level, while trying to remain in the same dataset. If the dataset is not in the selected NUTS level, the selected and displayed dataset is changed.

This method triggers a redraw of the map and the observation plot.

Parameters:
  • attr – attribute that triggered this callback
  • old – the old value of the attribute
  • new – the new value of the attribute
on_year_select(attr, old, new)¶

updatefunction for years

produce_column_data(input_data)¶

Generates a ColumnDataSource from the geojson path passed by input_data containing the coordinates for patches to draw on a map.

Parameters:input_data – Path to a geojson.
Returns:ColumnDataSource containing the coordinates for patches to draw on a map.
show_data()¶

Setup plots and commit them into the layout.

update_datasource(datasource, dataset, level, observation_name, period)¶

Updates the datasource to contain the datasets observations (observation_name and period) in the passed NUTS level.

Parameters:
  • datasource – The ColumnDataSource to update.
  • dataset – The dataset to get the observations from.
  • level – The NUTS Level.
  • observation_name – The name of the observation.
  • period – The period of interest.
Returns:
